verses.verse: וָאֶרְאֶ֗ה <WH7200> va-'er-'Eh, Then I looked וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- in הָרָקִ֙יעַ֙ <WH7549> ha-ra-Ki-a' and behold in the firmament אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher that was עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> rosh that was above the head הַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <WH3742> hak-ke-ru-Vim, of the cherubims כְּאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> ke-'E-ven stone סַפִּ֔יר <WH5601> sap-Pir, over them as it were a sapphire כְּמַרְאֵ֖ה <WH4758> ke-mar-'Eh as the appearance דְּמ֣וּת <WH1823> de-Mut of the likeness כִּסֵּ֑א <WH3678> kis-Se; of a throne נִרְאָ֖ה <WH7200> nir-'Ah there appeared עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem. above

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he spake אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָאִ֣ישׁ׀ <WH376> ha-'Ish unto the man לְבֻ֣שׁ <WH3847> le-Vush clothed הַבַּדִּ֗ים <WH906> hab-bad-Dim, with linen וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said בֹּא֩ <WH935> bo Go in אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about בֵּינ֨וֹת <WH996> bei-Not between לַגַּלְגַּ֜ל <WH1534> lag-gal-Gal the wheels אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat under לַכְּר֗וּב <WH3742> lak-ke-Ruv, [even] under the cherub וּמַלֵּ֨א <WH4390> u-mal-Le and fill חָפְנֶ֤יךָ <WH2651> cha-fe-Nei-cha thine hand גַֽחֲלֵי־ <WH1513> ga-cha-lei- with coals אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> 'esh of fire מִבֵּינ֣וֹת <WH996> mib-bei-Not from between לַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <WH3742> lak-ke-ru-Vim, the cherubims וּזְרֹ֖ק <WH2236> u-ze-Rok and scatter עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir; [them] over the city וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo And he went in לְעֵינָֽי׃ <WH5869> le-'ei-Nai. in my sight

וְהַכְּרֻבִ֗ים <WH3742> ve-hak-ke-ru-Vim, Now the cherubims עֹֽמְדִ֛ים <WH5975> 'o-me-Dim stood מִימִ֥ין <WH3225> mi-Min on the right side לַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> lab-Ba-yit of the house בְּבֹא֣וֹ <WH935> be-vo-'O went in הָאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish; when the man וְהֶעָנָ֣ן <WH6051> ve-he-'a-Nan and the cloud מָלֵ֔א <WH4390> ma-Le, filled אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הֶחָצֵ֖ר <WH2691> he-cha-Tzer court הַפְּנִימִֽית׃ <WH6442> hap-pe-ni-Mit. the inner

וַיָּ֤רָם <WH7311> vai-Ya-rom went up כְּבוֹד־ <WH3519> ke-Vod- Then the glory יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> Yah-weh God מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> me-'Al from הַכְּר֔וּב <WH3742> hak-ke-Ruv, from the cherub עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al unto מִפְתַּ֣ן <WH4670> mif-Tan [and stood] over the threshold הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit; of the house וַיִּמָּלֵ֤א <WH4390> vai-yim-ma-Le was filled הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit and the house אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with הֶ֣עָנָ֔ן <WH6051> he-'a-Nan, with the cloud וְהֶֽחָצֵר֙ <WH2691> ve-he-cha-Tzer and the court מָֽלְאָ֔ה <WH4390> mal-'Ah, was full אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with נֹ֖גַהּ <WH5051> No-gah of the brightness כְּב֥וֹד <WH3519> ke-Vod glory יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. God

וְקוֹל֙ <WH6963> ve-kOl And the sound כַּנְפֵ֣י <WH3671> kan-Fei wings הַכְּרוּבִ֔ים <WH3742> hak-ke-ru-Vim, of the cherubims' נִשְׁמַ֕ע <WH8085> nish-Ma' was heard עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far הֶחָצֵ֖ר <WH2691> he-cha-Tzer court הַחִיצֹנָ֑ה <WH2435> ha-chi-tzo-Nah; [even] to the outer כְּק֥וֹל <WH6963> ke-Kol as the voice אֵל־ <WH410> 'el- God שַׁדַּ֖י <WH7706> shad-Dai of the Almighty בְּדַבְּרֽוֹ׃ <WH1696> be-dab-be-Ro. when he speaketh

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, came בְּצַוֹּתוֹ֙ <WH6680> be-tzav-vo-To And it came to pass [that] when he had commanded אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish the man לְבֻֽשׁ־ <WH3847> le-vush- clothed הַבַּדִּים֙ <WH906> hab-bad-Dim with linen לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying קַ֥ח <WH3947> kach Take אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> 'esh fire מִבֵּינ֣וֹת <WH996> mib-bei-Not between לַגַּלְגַּ֔ל <WH1534> lag-gal-Gal, from between the wheels מִבֵּינ֖וֹת <WH996> mib-bei-Not between לַכְּרוּבִ֑ים <WH3742> lak-ke-ru-Vim; from between the cherubims וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo then he went in וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֔ד <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-Mod, and stood אֵ֖צֶל <WH681> 'E-tzel beside הָאוֹפָֽן׃ <WH212> ha-'o-Fan. the wheels

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach stretched forth הַכְּר֨וּב <WH3742> hak-ke-Ruv And [one] cherub אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יָד֜וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do his hand מִבֵּינ֣וֹת <WH996> mib-bei-Not between לַכְּרוּבִ֗ים <WH3742> lak-ke-ru-Vim, from between the cherubims אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָאֵשׁ֙ <WH784> ha-'Esh unto the fire אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher which בֵּינ֣וֹת <WH996> bei-Not was between הַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <WH3742> hak-ke-ru-Vim, that [was] between the cherubims וַיִּשָּׂא֙ <WH5375> vai-yis-Sa and took וַיִּתֵּ֔ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten, [thereof] and put אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to חָפְנֵ֖י <WH2651> cha-fe-Nei [it] into the hands לְבֻ֣שׁ <WH3847> le-Vush of [him that was] clothed הַבַּדִּ֑ים <WH906> hab-bad-Dim; with linen וַיִּקַּ֖ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach who took וַיֵּצֵֽא׃ <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze. [it] and went out

וַיֵּרָ֖א <WH7200> vai-ye-Ra And there appeared לַכְּרֻבִ֑ים <WH3742> lak-ke-ru-Vim; in the cherubims תַּבְנִית֙ <WH8403> tav-Nit the form יַד־ <WH3027> yad- hand אָדָ֔ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of a man's תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat under כַּנְפֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH3671> kan-fei-Hem. under their wings

וָאֶרְאֶ֗ה <WH7200> va-'er-'Eh, And when I looked וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold אַרְבָּעָ֣ה <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah behold the four אוֹפַנִּים֮ <WH212> o-fan-Nim wheels אֵ֣צֶל <WH681> 'E-tzel by הַכְּרוּבִים֒ <WH3742> hak-ke-ru-Vim the cherubims אוֹפַ֣ן <WH212> o-Fan wheel אֶחָ֗ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, one אֵ֚צֶל <WH681> 'E-tzel by הַכְּר֣וּב <WH3742> hak-ke-Ruv cherub אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, one וְאוֹפַ֣ן <WH212> ve-'o-Fan wheel אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, and another אֵ֖צֶל <WH681> 'E-tzel by הַכְּר֣וּב <WH3742> hak-ke-Ruv cherub אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> 'e-Chad; another וּמַרְאֵה֙ <WH4758> u-mar-'Eh and the appearance הָא֣וֹפַנִּ֔ים <WH212> ha-'o-fan-Nim, of the wheels כְּעֵ֖ין <WH5869> ke-'Ein [was] as the colour אֶ֥בֶן <WH68> 'E-ven stone תַּרְשִֽׁישׁ׃ <WH8658> tar-Shish. of a beryl

וּמַ֨רְאֵיהֶ֔ם <WH4758> u-Mar-'ei-Hem, And [as for] their appearances דְּמ֥וּת <WH1823> de-Mut likeness אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad had one לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֑ם <WH702> le-'ar-ba'-Tam; they four כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher if יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become הָאוֹפַ֖ן <WH212> ha-'o-Fan as if a wheel בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch had been in the midst הָאוֹפָֽן׃ <WH212> ha-'o-Fan. of a wheel

בְּלֶכְתָּ֗ם <WH1980> be-lech-Tam, moved אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about אַרְבַּ֤עַת <WH702> 'ar-Ba-'at upon their four רִבְעֵיהֶם֙ <WH7253> riv-'ei-Hem sides יֵלֵ֔כוּ <WH1980> ye-Le-chu, went לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo without יִסַּ֖בּוּ <WH5437> yis-Sab-bu they turned בְּלֶכְתָּ֑ם <WH1980> be-lech-Tam; went כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki in הַמָּק֞וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom but to the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which יִפְנֶ֤ה <WH6437> yif-Neh looked הָרֹאשׁ֙ <WH7218> ha-roSh whither the head אַחֲרָ֣יו <WH310> 'a-cha-Rav as they יֵלֵ֔כוּ <WH1980> ye-Le-chu, went לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo without יִסַּ֖בּוּ <WH5437> yis-Sab-bu it they turned בְּלֶכְתָּֽם׃ <WH1980> be-lech-Tam. moved

וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol their whole בְּשָׂרָם֙ <WH1320> be-sa-Ram And their whole body וְגַבֵּהֶ֔ם <WH1354> ve-gab-be-Hem, and their backs וִֽידֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3027> vi-dei-Hem and their hands וְכַנְפֵיהֶ֑ם <WH3671> ve-chan-fei-Hem; and their wings וְהָאֽוֹפַנִּ֗ים <WH212> ve-ha-'o-fan-Nim, and the wheels מְלֵאִ֤ים <WH4392> me-le-'Im [were] full עֵינַ֙יִם֙ <WH5869> 'ei-Na-yim of eyes סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> sa-Viv, round about לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֖ם <WH702> le-'ar-ba'-Tam that they four אוֹפַנֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH212> o-fan-nei-Hem. [even] the wheels

לָא֖וֹפַנִּ֑ים <WH212> la-'o-fan-Nim; As for the wheels לָהֶ֛ם la-Hem קוֹרָ֥א <WH7121> ko-Ra it was cried הַגַּלְגַּ֖ל <WH1534> hag-gal-Gal O wheel בְּאָזְנָֽי׃ <WH241> be-'a-ze-Nai. unto them in my hearing

וְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah had four פָנִ֖ים <WH6440> fa-Nim faces לְאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> le-'e-Chad; And every one פְּנֵ֨י <WH6440> pe-Nei face הָאֶחָ֜ד <WH259> ha-'e-Chad the first פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei [was] the face הַכְּר֗וּב <WH3742> hak-ke-Ruv, of a cherub וּפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> u-fe-Nei face הַשֵּׁנִי֙ <WH8145> hash-she-Ni and the second פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei [was] the face אָדָ֔ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of a man וְהַשְּׁלִישִׁי֙ <WH7992> ve-hash-she-li-Shi and the third פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei the face אַרְיֵ֔ה <WH738> 'ar-Yeh, of a lion וְהָרְבִיעִ֖י <WH7243> ve-ha-re-vi-'I and the fourth פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> pe-nei- the face נָֽשֶׁר׃ <WH5404> Na-sher. of an eagle

וַיֵּרֹ֖מּוּ <WH7426> vai-ye-Rom-mu were lifted up הַכְּרוּבִ֑ים <WH3742> hak-ke-ru-Vim; And the cherubims הִ֣יא <WH1931> hi he הַחַיָּ֔ה <WH2416> ha-chai-Yah, This [is] the living creature אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher i רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> ra-'I-ti that I saw בִּֽנְהַר־ <WH5104> bin-har- by the river כְּבָֽר׃ <WH3529> ke-Var. of Chebar

וּבְלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH1980> u-ve-Le-chet moved הַכְּרוּבִ֔ים <WH3742> hak-ke-ru-Vim, And when the cherubims יֵלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> ye-le-Chu go הָאוֹפַנִּ֖ים <WH212> ha-'o-fan-Nim the wheels אֶצְלָ֑ם <WH681> 'etz-Lam; by them וּבִשְׂאֵ֨ת <WH5375> u-vis-'Et lifted up הַכְּרוּבִ֜ים <WH3742> hak-ke-ru-Vim and when the cherubims אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כַּנְפֵיהֶ֗ם <WH3671> kan-fei-Hem, their wings לָרוּם֙ <WH7311> la-Rum to mount up מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> me-'Al from הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, from the earth לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not יִסַּ֧בּוּ <WH5437> yis-Sab-bu turned הָאוֹפַנִּ֛ים <WH212> ha-'o-fan-Nim the same wheels גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- again הֵ֖ם <WH1992> hem also מֵאֶצְלָֽם׃ <WH681> me-'etz-Lam. not from beside

בְּעָמְדָ֣ם <WH5975> be-'a-me-Dam When they stood יַעֲמֹ֔דוּ <WH5975> ya-'a-Mo-du, [these] stood וּבְרוֹמָ֖ם <WH7311> u-ve-ro-Mam and when they were lifted up יֵר֣וֹמּוּ <WH7426> ye-Rom-mu [these] lifted up אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> o-Tam; כִּ֛י <WH3588> ki for ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach themselves [also] for the spirit הַחַיָּ֖ה <WH2416> ha-chai-Yah of the living creature בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze departed כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> ke-Vod Then the glory יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> me-'Al over מִפְתַּ֣ן <WH4670> mif-Tan from off the threshold הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit; of the house וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-Mod and stood עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over הַכְּרוּבִֽים׃ <WH3742> hak-ke-ru-Vim. over the cherubims

וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <WH5375> vai-yis-'U lifted up הַכְּרוּבִ֣ים <WH3742> hak-ke-ru-Vim And the cherubims אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כַּ֠נְפֵיהֶם <WH3671> Kan-fei-hem their wings וַיֵּר֨וֹמּוּ <WH7426> vai-ye-Rom-mu and mounted up מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָאָ֤רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz from the earth לְעֵינַי֙ <WH5869> le-'ei-Nai in my sight בְּצֵאתָ֔ם <WH3318> be-tze-Tam, when they went out וְהָאֽוֹפַנִּ֖ים <WH212> ve-ha-'o-fan-Nim the wheels לְעֻמָּתָ֑ם <WH5980> le-'um-ma-Tam; also [were] beside וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֗ד <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-Mod, them and [every one] stood פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach at the door שַׁ֤עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar gate בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- house יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD'S הַקַּדְמוֹנִ֔י <WH6931> hak-kad-mo-Ni, of the east וּכְב֧וֹד <WH3519> u-che-Vod and the glory אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei- of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem over מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> mil-Ma-'e-lah. [was] over them above

הִ֣יא <WH1931> hi These הַחַיָּ֗ה <WH2416> ha-chai-Yah, This [is] the living creature אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher i רָאִ֛יתִי <WH7200> ra-'I-ti that I saw תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat beneath אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei- under the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בִּֽנְהַר־ <WH5104> bin-har- by the river כְּבָ֑ר <WH3529> ke-Var; of Chebar וָאֵדַ֕ע <WH3045> va-'e-Da' and I knew כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki that כְרוּבִ֖ים <WH3742> che-ru-Vim that they [were] the cherubims הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> Hem-mah. like
